message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SD, cs.NE 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as the paper proposes a new method for training neural language models. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also likely as the proposed method involves a large margin formulation, which is a common technique in machine learning. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is another possible category as neural language models are a subfield of AI. 
- cs.SD (Sound) is a possible category as the paper mentions speech recognition and WER (word error rate) reduction. 
- cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is also possible as the paper deals with neural language models.
